text:
[trapit-site-2014/] 3 new commits:
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/4dd1524455cd4834965965c8b84ce1834c31b05d|4dd1524455cd>: Fixed FF bug with WPAS banner.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/824cb6dd46a2c7d7b6cc2c953bd144c68b06599e|824cb6dd46a2>: Making sure default and custom images on resources are the same size.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/b3e9ee35a0287d0040f61646e1c49c9d3e80b788|b3e9ee35a028>: Updated Tommy's title on press page.
 - gastonfig
And we're live!!!!
Testing from home, all appears to be working
Really nice work everybody
Yay!
Driving in. But so far only one minor email I just forwardes
OK - I’ve been getting some notes from the Trapit team
most of them have been forwarded already
there’s a couple questions about the blog:
1) did we choose ‘<http://blog.trapit.com/blog|blog.trapit.com/blog>' because of a conflict with
2) <http://blog.trapit.com|blog.trapit.com>
And more importantly, can we kill, or redirect from <http://blog.trapit.com|blog.trapit.com>
hoping to look at this issue ASAP, because the plain URL is completely messed up
that is, <http://blog.trapit.com|blog.trapit.com>

[trapit-site-2014/] 3 new commits:
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/9959a9b2391bb7b8d15d048f12ba7a6cc2709ff4|9959a9b2391b>: Added GA code.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/63e9b5ad321d62b1d68e615c46bec41bad943656|63e9b5ad321d>: Fixed resources typo.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/ee8193651cd6414ba1a05fd78b2b4526e7683d3e|ee8193651cd6>: Fixed sign up form FF bug.
 - gastonfig
hey gaston did the new SVG not make it onto the homepage?
A file was shared
Oh, sorry about that. Updating now.
Are we doing standup?
sorry
coming
Proxima Nova is back on the blog.
awesome
gaston i am going to fix those SVGs right now
i just need to figure out how to do it in sketch :grinning:
So sorry you have to deal with that. I'll take half a day some time in the next weeks to understand better all these SVGs issues.
Don't want this bitting us again.
no worries, i just dont understand why sketch is moving everything by like... fractions of a pixel

Hubspot update: Was on the phone with support and it looks like there's no way to go back to the previous comments form. Is not clear yet why/how it created this new form. Not a big deal but I'll be some time until I can reassign the styles to the new form.
ok
The good news is that the blog modal looks good now.
also - kelly just forwarded a new potential hubspot bug
So don't feel like you need to make it look exactly how it did before
<http://blog.trap.it/blog>
the featured post - for some reason the S  is capital
seems like we could just add a stroke around the form fields, or make the form fields a light grey (#eeeeee)
and not that way in form
and that would be sufficient
Thanks <@U0260V1BX>
<@U0265G76F> Looking into that bug. Very strange.
thanks
and thank you for comment form update as well as the persistence of Pat’s prepopulated fields
:wink:
:grinning:
Comments form looking much better now, btw.
yah!
And the capital S bug is also fixed.
woohoo!
Again - blanket apology for random stuff today
"don't mean to add to your list, but any idea why social sharing (to facebook, linkedin) of just the trapit link doesn't come up with the homepage image, etc.?"
who's that from?
kelly
<@U02618EV1>: should i create a separate asset for social or can we pull assets from within the page?
I think having an asset is better so we can control what's displayed.
Let me get you the specs
i can do it, no worries
Let's do 1000x1000 px
i thought Fb was 1200x630?
but happy to do whatever
will that also be sufficient for linkedin?
Let's use the FB specs just in case.
k

[trapit-site-2014/] 2 new commits:
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/040c0fc374e9929749411ecb5e5e4d074908d20e|040c0fc374e9>: New slider paddles.
 - gastonfig
[trapit-site-2014/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/trapit-site-2014/commits/2de36889014f4d3cedd54ada8f52f63d82a5ca96|2de36889014f>: Updated slider paddles.
 - gastonfig
hey there team Trapit
kelly just wrote to say she’s had an issue a few times when trying to download Gary’s whitepaper
where she gets an ‘oops’ message
sorry - the standard chrome ‘oh snap’ message
has anybody else had issues downloading/viewing any of those PDFs?
i can’t seem to reproduce
Is Gary's whitepaper the PDF on the homepage?
his is in resources
i’ve tried every PDF on site
and can’t reproduce
she’s brought it up a few times today
i'm able to download it
hm
do you recall what settings we used for exporting gary’s?
same we used for exporting all others... though i'm not sure if kelly changed the settings when she updated the persona docs
but its the same settings as the homepage pdf
right
well, let’s just keep an eye on it
interactive PDF... i dont recall the particulars - i didn't really change anything from the indesign defaults
what do you mean by keep an eye on it?
it is apparently only Gary’s whitepaper
well - just to see if we hear anybody else with the issue
right
I'm also able to download everything with no issues. I'll try a few times in the next hours.
<@U0260V1BX> you can see the dragging now on <http://trcms.uncorkedstudios.com/> let me know what you think
<@U026PHQ3J|evans> has joined the channel
also, that cms points to the dev api so any changes you make to the weightings by dragging won’t effect <http://trap.it|trap.it>
affect
Welcome to <#C0261HHPM|trapit> <@U026PHQ3J>
Hey there. Just taking a peek
But of course let me know if I can be of service
can you fix all the things please?
You have any Trapit gifs?
I'll be good, I promise.
